text:
@GregAbbott_TX Texas.. #1 again
Texas on Wednesday reported 2,504 new coronavirus cases, the highest one-day total since the pandemic emerged.

(but last in healthcare coverage... still)

Does Hallmark make a “Thank a GOP for your loved ones death “ card?
